string.value: You've been in #m260000000# for a while... suddenly, #p2101005# contacts you, wanting to meet up. What's this about?
#p2101005# says you're ready to make a job advancement and recommends that you see #p1090000# in Victoria Island. Hm, better take Byron's Recommendation Letter and go see #b#p1090000##k, then.
You showed #p1090000# the recommendation letter written by #p2101005#. #p1090000# trusts #p2101005#'s judgement and told you to drop by whenever you're ready to make your job advancement.
Hey, how's it going? I've been watching your every move, and... you look like you're ready for an advancement... and I want to recommend you to #p1090000#. What do you think?
I've known #p1090000# for a long time. Please visit #b#p1090000##k on the Nautilus. He'll be help you advance your job.
Do you feel like you're not ready to make the leap? You're humble, which is great, but keep in mind that this opportunity to make a job advancement disappears after a while...
Do I know you? Are you here to deliver something to me?
#p2101005#'s recommendation, huh? You must be seeking job advancement. If you really want to change your job, you need to take the test.
Here, you can become a great Pirate.
Did you lose the recommendation? I can write a new one for you.
Please try not to lose it this time.
